texts.name: Ryland
texts.biography: Ryland was the first (and to date, the only) human ever fully accepted by the Circle of Elder Dendroids as a Ranger of AvLee.  Some joke that he was once an Elf, but that he was killed and accidentally reincarnated into a human's body.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Dendroid Guards or Soldiers for each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.name: Dendroids
